column4: Hey all, I'm trying to use nfs to share files between two Linux PC's, one Kubuntu 6.10 one Ubuntu 7.04, I'm having trouble with permissions, anyone care to advise?
mount: 192.168.0.1:fah failed, reason given by server: Permission denied
you must make sure that gui/uids are in sync on your clients/servers
you might want to use NIS or ldap or sync passwd files in some way to ensure consistant uids
